code: import React from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageSwitcher=()=>{const{i18n}=useTranslation();const changeLanguage=lang=>{i18n.changeLanguage(lang);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("en"),className:"px-3 py-1 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded",children:"EN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>changeLanguage("de"),className:"px-3 py-1 bg-gray-500 text-white rounded",children:"DE"})]});};export default LanguageSwitcher;
